description: Specialty coffee shop offering frozen drinks, frappes, and breakfast items

items.name: Egg, Cheese, Sausage, Croissant
items.description: Breakfast sandwich with egg, cheese, and sausage on a buttery croissant

items.name: Breakfast Special
items.description: Daily breakfast special with chef's selection

items.name: Mocha Freeze
items.description: Frozen coffee drink with chocolate. Available in Small ($4.75) or Large ($5.25). Customize with milk options and add-ons.

items.name: Cappuccino Freeze
items.description: Frozen cappuccino. Available in Small ($4.45) or Large ($4.95). Customize with milk options and add-ons.

items.name: Coconut Frappe
items.description: Blended coconut frappe. Available in Small ($4.50) or Large ($5.00). Customize with milk options and add-ons.

items.name: Vanilla Bean Frappe
items.description: Blended vanilla bean frappe. Available in Small ($4.50) or Large ($5.00). Customize with milk options and add-ons.

items.name: Iced Latte
items.description: Espresso with cold milk over ice. Available in Small ($3.85) or Large ($4.45). Customize with milk options and add-ons.

items.name: Iced Vanilla Latte
items.description: Espresso with vanilla syrup and cold milk over ice. Available in Small ($4.40) or Large ($4.95). Customize with milk options and add-ons.

items.name: Cafe Latte
items.description: Espresso with steamed milk. Available in Small ($3.25), Medium ($3.95), or Large ($4.25). Customize with milk options and add-ons.

items.name: Vanilla Latte
items.description: Espresso with vanilla syrup and steamed milk. Available in Small ($3.75), Medium ($4.45), or Large ($4.75). Customize with milk options and add-ons.

notes: Add-ons available: Almond Milk ($0.60), Soy Milk ($0.60), Breve ($0.60), Espresso Extra Shot ($0.80), Flavored Syrup ($0.50). Prices shown are for smallest size unless noted.
